definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
(slang) high-end, elegant, and classy/abbr. for 高端大氣上檔次|高端大气上档次

sentences.english: The tall Gothic windows glinted in the sinking sun.
sentences.chinese: 高大的哥特式窗户在夕阳的照耀下闪闪发光。

sentences.english: The depictions of the two Zenos are similar; both were tall.
sentences.chinese: 对两个芝诺的描绘是相似的，他们都同样高大。

sentences.english: I love all those magnificent trees on the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢草坪上所有那些高大的树。

sentences.english: From the window of my room, I could see a tall cotton-rose hibiscus.
sentences.chinese: 房间的窗户外面，一株高大的木芙蓉。

sentences.english: A big man can have bodily strength, but spiritual weakness.
sentences.chinese: 一个身材高大的人可能身体健壮，但可能精神脆弱。

sentences.english: Like your romantic, kind-hearted, simple, tall and strong.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢你的浪漫，善良，单纯，高大，有力。

sentences.english: High willows ranged along the highway.
sentences.chinese: 高大的柳树排列在公路两旁。

sentences.english: That tall actor is a dishy man.
sentences.chinese: 那个高大的演员是个有性感魅力的男人。

sentences.english: The oak is a tall tree with nuts that are called acorns.
sentences.chinese: 橡树是结有坚果的高大树木，坚果叫做橡实。

sentences.english: Tall, project of the grand, in the Heze area come first on the list.
sentences.chinese: 高大，工程之宏伟，在菏泽地区首屈一指。

sentences.english: She is a big young woman, and I should think at least eight years older than Lupin.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个高大的女人，我认为至少比卢宾大入岁。

sentences.english: We didn't want the models to look like toys in comparison to these tall mannequins.
sentences.chinese: 我们不想模型在这些高大的人体模型旁显得像玩具。

sentences.english: Rumbold. Mrs. Rumbold was a large, unsmiling lady in a tight black dress.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个很高大，严肃的穿着紧身黑裙子的夫人。

sentences.english: The Bell Tower in Xi'an was not only built earlier, but also taller than any other in the country.
sentences.chinese: 因而西安的钟楼不但修的早，而且也修得高大雄伟。

sentences.english: They were sitting on the lawn under a large beech tree.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一棵高大的山毛榉树下的草坪上坐着。

sentences.english: I imagined you as a big tall man.
sentences.chinese: 我以为你是个高大的人。
